TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi sealed XmlValueGetter extends System.MulticastDelegate
Public Delegate Function XmlValueGetter() As Object
type XmlValueGetter = delegate of unit -> obj

summary.span: 一个 ， 类使用它将特性、文本和空白值作为与特性、文本或空白的 XML 架构定义语言 (XSD) 类型相兼容的公共语言运行时 (CLR) 类型进行传递。

span.span: A used by the class to pass attribute, text, and white space values as a Common Language Runtime (CLR) type compatible with the XML Schema Definition Language (XSD) type of the attribute, text, or white space.

returns.span: 包含特性、文本或空白值的对象。

span.span: An object containing the attribute, text, or white space value.

returns.span: 此对象是与特性、文本或空白值的 XSD 类型相对应的 CLR 类型。

span.span: The object is a CLR type that corresponds to the XSD type of the attribute, text, or white space value.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `delegate` 如果属性、文本或空白节点的 CLR 值已可用，则此方法非常有用，可避免将其转换为的开销， `string` 然后再次重新分析它进行验证。An `delegate` is useful if the CLR value of an attribute, text, or white space node is already available, and avoids the cost of converting it to a `string` and then reparsing it again for validation. 有关类的详细信息 ，请参阅 [XmlSchemaValidator Push-Based 验证](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation) 主题或 类参考文档。For more information about the class, see the [XmlSchemaValidator Push-Based Validation](/dotnet/standard/data/xml/xmlschemavalidator-push-based-validation) topic, or the class reference documentation. ## Examples 下面的示例 `contosoBooks.xml` 根据架构对文件进行验证 `contosoBooks.xsd` 。The following example validates the `contosoBooks.xml` file against the `contosoBooks.xsd` schema. 该示例使用 类反序列化 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件，并将节点的值传递给 类的方法。The example uses the class to deserialize the `contosoBooks.xml` file and pass the value of the nodes to the methods of the class. [!code-csharp[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/csharp/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/CS/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.cs#1)] [!code-vb[XmlSchemaValidatorExamples#1](~/samples/snippets/visualbasic/VS_Snippets_Data/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples/VB/XmlSchemaValidatorExamples.vb#1)] 该示例使用 `contosoBooks.xml` 文件作为输入。The example takes the `contosoBooks.xml` file as input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#2](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xml#2)] 该示例还使用 `contosoBooks.xsd` 作为输入。The example also takes the `contosoBooks.xsd` as an input. [!code-xml[XPathXMLExamples#3](~/samples/snippets/xml/VS_Snippets_Data/XPathXMLExamples/XML/contosoBooks.xsd#3)]
